Articles.Content:
I hope this is welcome in this forum, if not then could a mod please move it.
================================================================================================================
This Imgur album is a tribute to Carl Sagan's "Pale Blue Dot" quote.

http://imgur.com/a/b0CZo
Very nice! I'd just recommend hiding the UI in the first few pics.
Yeah, I forgot about the UI and the time warp stamps. Thanks, however!
